p: In the following, we summarize computational and integrative modelling methods, guided by biophysical data, that have yielded molecular insights into the “ins” and “outs” of enveloped flaviviruses. In Section 3, we begin by highlighting areas of ongoing interest in the context of viral envelope dynamics, which have been tackled recently using a combination of multiscale simulation and experiment. We then go on to detail efforts to characterize the virion’s nucleocapsid cargo via simulation ( Section 4) and RNA sequencing-guided modelling ( Section 5), before reflecting upon where future efforts may lie in better understanding enveloped viruses ( Section 6).
